column5: The demand for digital marketing expertise is on the rise. Our programme, developed in collaboration with the Digital Marketing Institute, provides the skills needed for a successful career in digital marketing. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a digital marketer, or someone with a creative mindset, this course equips you to create and manage effective digital campaigns.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
